metadata.title: CVE-2018-13139 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
A stack-based buffer overflow in psf_memset in common.c in libsndfile1.0.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted audio file.The vulnerability can be triggered by the executable sndfile-deinterleave.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-13139` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.28-4ubuntu0.18.04.1
sndfile-programs - 1.0.28-4ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.28-4ubuntu0.18.04.1').
